✅ Preview button in toolbar - Added PreviewIcon and onPreview callback to CanvasToolbar

✅ Visual animation of data flowing through nodes - Animated execution with pulsing status indicators
✅ Shows expected output at each node - Expandable output sections with JSON/text preview
✅ Can step through execution manually - Step forward button, play/pause controls, and progress tracking

Additional features implemented:
- **Auto-Play Mode**: Automatic progression through nodes with configurable speed (1500ms default)
- **Manual Stepping**: Step-by-step execution with pause/resume functionality
- **Execution Order**: Topological sort (BFS) to determine correct node execution sequence
- **Node Simulation**: Mock execution for each node type (input passthrough, agent AI response, output formatting)
- **Real-Time Status**: Visual feedback showing pending/running/completed/error states per node
- **Progress Tracking**: Progress bar and step counter showing current position in flow
- **Collapsible Outputs**: View detailed output for each node with syntax highlighting
- **Timestamp Tracking**: Execution timestamp for each node in the flow
- **Error Handling**: Graceful error display with specific error messages
- **Responsive Layout**: Two-panel design with inputs/controls on left, execution log on right
- **Comprehensive JSDoc**: Full documentation following codebase patterns
- **Full TypeScript Safety**: Proper typing throughout with type guards and interfaces
- **Inline PauseCircleIcon**: Custom SVG icon component (not available in Icons.tsx)

- Integrated FlowPreview component into FlowEditorVisual
